spiritsExplanation:
The workout is named 'Power Flow,' indicating a focus on smooth, continuous movement patterns, which aligns with the 'Flow & Rhythm' spirit. The description also mentions a scenic location 'overlooking the water and mountains in Vallavik, Norway.' This natural outdoor setting aligns with the 'Outdoor & Adventure' spirit. Although it’s an on-the-mat session, the presence of natural elements and the mention of the outdoor setting support a score of 0.8 for this spirit. Overall, the flow-centered description and location provide high confidence for this dual classification.
